results.title: Evaluation of the Antinociceptive Action of Simvastatin in Mice
results.text_hl: This finding suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ has dose-dependent analgesic activity in both @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@neurogenic pain@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@inflammatory pain@@@.

results.title: Evaluation of efficacy of simvastatin in bone regeneration following local application in third molar extraction socket: A randomized control trial
results.text_hl: In the present study, the study socket (with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) reported severe @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ (mean VAS 2.94 +- 0.71) on the 1st postoperative day while that of control socket (without @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) reported severe @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ (mean VAS 3.14 +- 0.61).

citations.NLM: Harsha G, Madhavi S, Arthi S, Haritha S. Evaluation of efficacy of simvastatin in bone regeneration following local application in third molar extraction socket: A randomized control trial Natl J Maxillofac Surg. 2023 May-Aug;14(2):286-293. PMID: 37661989

results.title: Scrutinising the role of simvastatin in a patient of Pachyonychia Congenita with KRT6A gene mutation.
results.text_hl: On genetic analysis, a heterozygous @GENE_KRT6A @GENE_3853 @@@KRT6A@@@ gene missense mutation (@VARIANT_c.1381G>A_KRT6A_human @VARIANT_tmVar:c|SUB|G|1381|A;HGVS:c.1381G>A;VariantGroup:0;CorrespondingGene:3853;RS#:267607468;CorrespondingSpecies:9606;CA#:217327 @@@c.1381G > A@@@, @VARIANT_c.1381G>A_KRT6A_human @VARIANT_tmVar:p|SUB|E|461|K;HGVS:p.E461K;VariantGroup:0;CorrespondingGene:3853;RS#:267607468;CorrespondingSpecies:9606;CA#:217327 @@@p.Glu461Lys@@@ in exon 7) was identified by next-generation sequencing technology, consistent with @DISEASE_Pachyonychia_Congenita @DISEASE_MESH:D053549 @@@pachyonychia congenita 6a@@@. Oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg was started once daily, and after 16 weeks of therapy, excellent improvement was noted in @DISEASE_Keratoderma_Palmoplantar @DISEASE_MESH:D007645 @@@palmoplantar keratoderma@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@plantar pain@@@.

citations.NLM: Sharma S, Dayal S, Aggarwal K, Gowda V M V, Kaur R. Scrutinising the role of simvastatin in a patient of Pachyonychia Congenita with KRT6A gene mutation. Australas J Dermatol. 2022 May;63(2):e145-e149. PMID: 35429339
citations.BibTeX: @article{35429339, title={Scrutinising the role of simvastatin in a patient of Pachyonychia Congenita with KRT6A gene mutation.}, author={Sharma S and Dayal S and Aggarwal K and Gowda V M V and Kaur R}, journal={Australas J Dermatol}, volume={63}, number={2}, pages={e145-e149}}

results.title: Nonhormonal Treatment for Endometriosis Focusing on Redox Imbalance.
results.text_hl: Several antioxidants that suppress @CHEMICAL_Free_Radicals @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005609 @@@free radicals@@@ may be effective in @DISEASE_Endometriosis @DISEASE_MESH:D004715 @@@endometriosis@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@. We searched for 23 compounds and natural substances that could reduce the @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ caused by @CHEMICAL_Superoxides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013481 @@@superoxide@@@/@CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@reactive oxygen species@@@ in basic research and animal models.

citations.NLM: Nagayasu M, Imanaka S, Kimura M, Maruyama S, Kobayashi H. Nonhormonal Treatment for Endometriosis Focusing on Redox Imbalance. Gynecol Obstet Invest. 2021;86(1-2):1-12. PMID: 33395684

results.title: Effects of Simvastatin Beyond Dyslipidemia: Exploring Its Antinociceptive Action in an Animal Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome-Type I
results.text_hl: Relevantly, the antinociceptive effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ did not seem to be associated with modulation of the descending @<m>DISEASE_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ circuits, especially noradrenergic, serotoninergic and dopaminergic systems.

citations.NLM: Vieira G, Cavalli J, Gonçalves ECD, Gonçalves TR, Laurindo LR, Cola M, Dutra RC. Effects of Simvastatin Beyond Dyslipidemia: Exploring Its Antinociceptive Action in an Animal Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome-Type I Front Pharmacol. 2017;8():584. PMID: 28928655
